description: This Python script initializes a text knowledge base using a PostgreSQL vector database, loads it, creates an agent with this knowledge, and prompts the agent to respond to a query.

classes.name: TextKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a text-based knowledge base backed by a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base to generate responses.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class representing a PostgreSQL vector database implementation.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt.
